mods.abstract: Runaway in Jail. A negro girl, who calls herself ROSALIN and says that she belongs to Don Louis Guillory, a resident of this Parish, was lodged in the Parish Jail, at Opelousas, on THURSDAY, the 10th instant. She is about 5 feet high, 16 years old, and speaks French and English. When brought to Jail she was chained to a large brindle dog. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property and take him away, or he will be dealt with according to law. RENE RAULIN, Jailor.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
